full_description:
Antec Fusion 120 ARGB Case Fan White (5 in 1 Pack)

The Antec Fusion 120 ARGB white Case Fan is a high-performance cooling solution for your computer. It features a sleek, modern design with a 120mm fan size and an ARGB LED lighting system. The fan blades are optimized for maximum airflow, providing efficient cooling for your system. The ARGB lighting system allows you to customize the look of your fan with a variety of color options and lighting modes. The fan is also equipped with a PWM control system, allowing you to adjust the speed and noise level according to your preference. This case fan is a great choice for anyone looking to improve the cooling and aesthetics of their computer.

PWM Control System

The Antec Fusion 120 ARGB White Case Fan is equipped with a PWM control system, which allows you to adjust the speed and noise level according to your preference. This feature gives you the flexibility to control the fan's speed based on the temperature of your system. It also ensures that the fan runs quietly, even at high speeds.

ARGB Lighting System

The Antec Fusion 120 ARGB White Case Fan comes with an ARGB LED lighting system that allows you to customize the look of your fan with a variety of color options and lighting modes. You can easily change the color and lighting mode using the included remote control. The lighting system adds a beautiful and dynamic effect to your computer case, making it stand out from the crowd.

Easy Installation

The Antec Fusion 120 ARGB White Case Fan is easy to install and comes with all the necessary hardware for a quick and seamless setup. The fan also comes with a 3-pin to the 4-pin adapter for compatibility with a wide range of motherboards. This makes it a great choice for both new and experienced builders.

product_list_short_description: Fan Type: ARGB PWM Hydro Bearing Fan

product_page_short_description: Fan Type: ARGB PWM Hydro Bearing Fan
full_description:
Antec Neon 120 ARGB 3 in 1 Pack Casing Fan with Controller

The Antec Neon 120 PWM ARGB 3 in 1 Pack Casing Fan is a flexible and effective cooling option made to improve your PC build's looks and performance. The fan speed can be dynamically adjusted based on cooling requirements, ranging from 800 to 1600 RPM with a ±10% fluctuation. Effective heat dissipation is ensured by these fans' ability to produce an airflow of 35 CFM and air pressure of 1.38 mmH2O. Even with their strong performance, they have a noise level of only 25.6 dB(A). This fan has a 120mm diameter and uses a hydro bearing, which is renowned for its dependability and seamless functioning and has a lifespan of up to 30,000 hours at 25°C. The ARGB (Addressable RGB) lighting on the Antec Neon 120 ARGB Casing Fans adds vivid, adjustable lighting effects to the fan's visual appearance. An LED connector with three pins can be used to control the illumination, while a 4-pin PWM connector on the fan itself allows the motherboard to control its speed precisely. The DC 6.0-13.2V operating voltage range for the fan and the DC 4.5-5.2V operating voltage range for the LEDs are specified for the Antec Neon 120 ARGB 3 in 1 Pack Casing Fans. The fan motor is rated for a voltage of DC 12V, while the LEDs need DC 5V. Ensuring efficient power usage, the rated currents for the fan and LEDs are respectively < 0.10A ± 10% and ≤ 0.26A ± 10%.

The Antec Neon 120 ARGB 3 in 1 Pack Casing Fan comes with 1 year warranty.

full_description:
Antec P12 PWM 120mm Case Fan (Single Pack)

The Antec P12 PWM 120mm Case Fan comes with minimalism styling and optimized fan blade design. The Antec P12 PWM provides powerful cooling performance and a fine texture. It comes with a 9 Fan Blade Design and this multiple fan blade design optimizes the airflow and reduces the noise. You can connect the 45cm 4-Pin PWM cable to the motherboard for the PWM function. The Antec P12 PWM is equipped with a Hydraulic Bearing that extends the lifespan and reduces the noise. This case fan is equipped with 8 anti-vibration pads, which will reduce vibration and noise. Antec P12 PWM comes with a 1-year warranty.

full_description:
Antec Prizm X 120 ARGB 3+C Cooling Fan

The Prizm X 120 ARGB case fan features a dual-ring aperture design, which allows you to display ARGB effects on both sides of the assembly. It features 24 Independent RGB LED Beads. Each LED bead can emit lighting colors from the dual rings and center to create chromatic visual effects. With the ARGB LED Lighting mode, you can enjoy up to 16.8 million colors and coordinate your custom scheme for endless variety. It comes with a Multi-function fan controller for up to 5 fans. You can easily switch between light modes to create a unique custom color. The PWM Intelligent Case Fan Speed automatically adjusts according to temperature, effectively reducing system noise while achieving excellent heat dissipation. The Prizm X case fan uses hydraulic bearings to reduce noise and friction, lasting up to 40,000 hours. It has Shock-absorbing Pads on All Four Corners that protect the fan and reduce vibration noise between the fan and the case. The Antec Prizm X 120 ARGB has 2 years of warranty.
